languages.text: Огонь — лучшее лекарство от скверны. Колония пылает, но с ересью покончено.
The best cure for corruption is fire. The colony is set ablaze, but the heresy is no more.
languages.original_text: Огонь — лучшее лекарство от скверны. Колония пылает, но с ересью покончено.

traits.locale_text: The best cure for corruption is fire. The colony is set ablaze, but the heresy is no more.
The colony loses precious cogitators, but the people manage to avoid the scrap-code's effects.

languages.text: La purification par le feu reste le meilleur remède à la corruption. La colonie est à feu et à sang, mais toute trace d'hérésie en a disparu.
languages.original_text: The best cure for corruption is fire. The colony is set ablaze, but the heresy is no more.

traits.locale_text: La purification par le feu reste le meilleur remède à la corruption. La colonie est à feu et à sang, mais toute trace d'hérésie en a disparu.

languages.text: 腐敗に対する最良の治療法は火である。コロニーは燃え上がるが、異端はもうない。
languages.original_text: The best cure for corruption is fire. The colony is set ablaze, but the heresy is no more.

traits.locale_text: 腐敗に対する最良の治療法は火である。コロニーは燃え上がるが、異端はもうない。

languages.text: 治疗腐化最好的药物就是烈焰。殖民地化成了灰烬，而异端邪说也不复存在。
languages.original_text: The best cure for corruption is fire. The colony is set ablaze, but the heresy is no more.

traits.locale_text: 治疗腐化最好的药物就是烈焰。殖民地化成了灰烬，而异端邪说也不复存在。

languages.text: La mejor cura para la corrupción es el fuego. La colonia entera arde, pero la corrupción desaparece.
languages.original_text: The best cure for corruption is fire. The colony is set ablaze, but the heresy is no more.

traits.locale_text: La mejor cura para la corrupción es el fuego. La colonia entera arde, pero la corrupción desaparece.

languages.text: Das beste Mittel die Verderbnis ist Feuer. Die Kolonie wird in Brand gesetzt, doch die Ketzerei hat ein Ende.
languages.original_text: The best cure for corruption is fire. The colony is set ablaze, but the heresy is no more.

traits.locale_text: Das beste Mittel die Verderbnis ist Feuer. Die Kolonie wird in Brand gesetzt, doch die Ketzerei hat ein Ende.

languages.text: Yozluğun en iyi ilacı ateştir. Koloni ateşe veriliyor ve kâfirlik sona eriyor.
languages.original_text: The best cure for corruption is fire. The colony is set ablaze, but the heresy is no more.
